functions._comment0: Any abilities not specified will use their default value
functions._comment1: Abilities not known at loot time are still added to
functions._comment2: the elytra as shadow abilities, which helps keep
functions._comment3: consistency in worlds where mods are added/removed,
functions._comment4: For example, the Jetpack ability added here is added
functions._comment5: to elytras, but ignored at runtime unless the
functions._comment6: Aerobatic Elytra Jetpack mod is loaded
